puzzles.title: Sequence Recall I
puzzles.description: Memorize and repeat the sequence of neural pulses.

puzzles.title: Neural Pathways I
puzzles.description: Connect the correct neural pathways to complete the circuit.

puzzles.title: Synapse Response I
puzzles.description: Click the neural nodes as they appear within the time limit.

puzzles.title: Pattern Recognition I
puzzles.description: Identify and continue the neural pattern sequence.

puzzles.title: Sequence Recall II
puzzles.description: Memorize a longer sequence of neural pulses.

puzzles.title: Neural Pathways II
puzzles.description: Navigate a more complex circuit to connect the pathways.

puzzles.title: Synapse Response II
puzzles.description: Click faster as the nodes appear more rapidly.

puzzles.title: Pattern Recognition II
puzzles.description: Identify a more complex pattern sequence.
